education.title: Diploma in Engineering - 2019
education.description: During my diploma, I learned the fundamentals of web development, including HTML, CSS, and basic UI design principles. This is where I built my foundational understanding of front-end development and started creating simple, responsive web pages.

education.title: B. Tech - 2022
education.description: During my B.Tech, I expanded my technical skill set by learning Tailwind CSS, Data Structures & Algorithms (DSA), Node.js, backend development with Java/Spring Boot, and the integration of frontend and backend systems. This helped me strengthen my problem-solving abilities and build full-stack applications with clean architecture, optimized performance, and seamless API integration.
